logbinres.comment: Resoving power for common spectral binnin. A linear binning wavelength integral is estimated as wl_min/R

wl_min.comment: Shortest wavelength in simularion used for binning input spectra

wl_max.comment: Shortest wavelength in simularion used for binning input spectra

PointingModel.comment: Jitter PSD in units of deg**2/Hz

pointing_scan_throw.comment: Positive value enables scan-mode simulation. The value defines the throw of the scan, in arcsec. The period of the scan is defined by the exposure time.

use_planck_spectrum.comment: If True, use a Planck function for the stllar sed, otherwise use Phoenix

OpenExoplanetCatalogue.comment: Path to openexoplanet catalogue. Null string downloads from URL.

StarLimbDarkening.comment: Path to Model Limb Darkening coefficients table

exposure_time.comment: time for one exposure containg set of NDRs

nGND.comment: duration of reset event in units of 1/frame_rate

nNDR0.comment: Integration time of first NDR in units of 1/frame_rate

nRST.comment: Time lapse between last NDR and reset in units of 1/frame_rate

before_transit.comment: fraction of T14 for pre-transit observation

after_transit.comment: fraction of T14 for post-transit observation

is_spec.comment: if True, channel is a spectrometer, otherwise a photometer (no spectral dispersion)

slit_width.comment: Size of slit image in units of detector pixels

ld.comment: Wavelength solution (q, m, x_ref): wl = q + m(x - x_ref) where x is th pixel coordinate in units of micron

osf.comment: Oversample each detector pixel by this amount. Need to be changed

qe_rms_matrix_file.comment: [Default 'None'] Path to CSV file containing matrix of QE of pixels.
